title: Untitled [castle and two figures]
description: castle with star-filled night sky behind it; two figures--male elf at right carrying a bag, with pointed ears, wearing a tunic, striped stockings and a tall pointed cap, has his arm around another figure wearing a cap with a pompon on top--standing on cobblestone path leading to castle
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
